name: zip(_:_:_:)
desc: Combines elements from three other publishers and delivers groups of elements as tuples.
declaration: func zip<P, Q, R>(_ publisher1: P, _ publisher2: Q, _ publisher3: R) -> Publishers.Zip4<Self, P, Q, R> where P : Publisher, Q : Publisher, R : Publisher, Self.Failure == P.Failure, P.Failure == Q.Failure, Q.Failure == R.Failure
